enum.name: MARSH_COMPONENT
enum.description: Component ids (values) for different nodes of the simulator network (flight model, controls, visualisation etc.). Components will always receive messages from the Manager relevant for their ID. Only the first component in a network with a given system ID and component ID will have its messages forwarded by the Manager, all other ones will only be treated as output (will be shadowed). This enum is a redefinition of MAV_COMP_ID_USER# messages from MAV_COMPONENT documented at https://mavlink.io/en/messages/common.html#MAV_COMPONENT

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_MANAGER
entry.description: The simulation manager responsible for routing packets between different nodes. Typically MARSH Manager, see https://marsh-sim.github.io/manager.html

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_FLIGHT_MODEL
entry.description: Component simulating flight dynamics of the aircraft.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_CONTROLS
entry.description: Component providing pilot control inputs.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_VISUALISATION
entry.description: Component showing the visual situation to the pilot.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_INSTRUMENTS
entry.description: Component implementing pilot instrument panel.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_MOTION_PLATFORM
entry.description: Component that moves the entire cockpit for motion cueing.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_GSEAT
entry.description: Component for in-seat motion cueing.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_EYE_TRACKER
entry.description: Component providing gaze data of pilot eyes.

entry.name: MARSH_COMP_ID_CONTROL_LOADING
entry.description: Component measuring and actuating forces on pilot control inputs.

enum.name: CONTROL_AXIS
enum.description: Specific axis of pilot control inputs, with order corresponding to x, y, z, r fields in MANUAL_CONTROL message.

entry.name: CONTROL_AXIS_PITCH
entry.description: Pitch axis, with positive values corresponding to stick forward movement, causing the vehicle to move nose down. For helicopters this is longitudinal cyclic.

entry.name: CONTROL_AXIS_ROLL
entry.description: Roll axis, with positive values corresponding to stick right movement, causing the vehicle to roll right. For helicopters this is lateral cyclic.

entry.name: CONTROL_AXIS_THRUST
entry.description: Main thrust, with positive values corresponding to going faster and higher. For helicopters this is collective.

entry.name: CONTROL_AXIS_YAW
entry.description: Yaw axis, with positive values corresponding to pushing right pedal, causing the vehicle to face right direction. For helicopters this is tail collective.

enum.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE
enum.description: Mode of a motion platform system.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_UNKNOWN
entry.description: Mode information is unsupported on this device.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_UNINITIALIZED
entry.description: Mode is currently not available, but may be in different condition.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_OFF
entry.description: Platform actuators are turned off, but control system is responsive.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_SETTLED
entry.description: Platform is in the lowest position and/or locked, appropriate for personnel entry.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_NEUTRAL
entry.description: Platform is in a neutral reference position, not accepting movement commands.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_FROZEN
entry.description: Platform is stopped in any position, not accepting movement commands.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_MODE_ENGAGED
entry.description: Platform is in any position, accepting movement commands.

enum.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_HEALTH
enum.description: General error state of a motion platform system.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_HEALTH_OK
entry.description: System is operating correctly.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_HEALTH_WARNING
entry.description: There is at least one warning present, but operation can be continued.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_HEALTH_ERROR
entry.description: There is a failure or misconfiguration that requires operator's attention for correct operation.

entry.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_HEALTH_CRITICAL
entry.description: There is a major failure that requires immediate operator action to maintain safety.

enum.name: REXROTH_MOTION_PLATFORM_ERROR
enum.description: Error codes specific to eMotion Motion System from Bosch Rexroth. Details described in GENERIC-02-30-7100-IML-0700 document.

entry.name: REXROTH_ERR_OK
entry.description: No error.

message.name: CONTROL_LOADING_AXIS
message.description: Send data about a control axis from a control loading system. This is the primary message for logging data from MARSH_COMP_ID_CONTROL_LOADING.
message.field: Control axis on which the measurements were taken.
Force applied in the pilot in the direction of movement axis (not gripping force), measured at the position of pilot's third finger (ring).

message.name: MOTION_PLATFORM_STATE
message.description: State report for motion platform used for moving the cockpit with the pilot for motion cueing. This is the primary message for MARSH_COMP_ID_MOTION_PLATFORM
message.field: Generic system health (error and warning) status.

message.name: REXROTH_MOTION_PLATFORM
message.description: State report specific for eMotion Motion System by Bosch Rexroth B.V. Values applicable to motion platforms in general are sent in MOTION_PLATFORM_STATE with the same timestamp. Actuators are numbered in a clockwise direction when looking from above, starting from the front right. Actuator position is 0 when actuator is in mid-stroke.
message.field: Number of message as sent by the Motion System.
Motion Status variable as sent by the system.
Error code extracted from motion status.
X axis (surge) platform setpoint, positive forward.
Y axis (sway) platform setpoint, positive right.
Z axis (heave) platform setpoint, positive down.
Pitch platform setpoint, positive nose up.
X axis (surge) special effect setpoint, positive forward.
Y axis (sway) special effect setpoint, positive right.
Z axis (heave) special effect setpoint, positive down.
Pitch special effect setpoint, positive nose up.
Roll special effect setpoint, positive right.
Yaw special effect setpoint, positive right.
